TopicTitle: The R.A.P.I.E.R. engine has been nerfed

Articles.Content:
The max thrust of jet mode has been reduced from 190 kn to 100 kn. Rocket mode max thrust remains at 175 kn.

Edit: Oops. Apparently this is only with FAR installed. My bad.

Edited December 23, 2014 by Blind Dead McJones
Correction

Lol, was about to say that I perhaps used the (stock) r.a.p.i.e.r, twice. The fact that it is not strong enough (I mean a ramjet is better in atmos, and many rockets are better in space)

If they nerfed it, would be no reason to use at all. If anything, it's performances needs to be improved to be top notch atmos ISP and great space ISP to be a serious contender (put it farther in tech tree if you want). Does give me a part to modify tho, once "adjusted" it becomes awesome
